content: 2 row once more ©caoua coffee 2012 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved bly v 1 1 page 3/5 bly socks - by caoua coffee turn heel ws sl yf p20 p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb k7 ssk k1 turn ws sl yf purl to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb knit to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn repeat theses last 2 row until all sts have been worked now 22 heel sts remain gusset setup pick up and knit 17 sts along side of heel flap pick up one more st between flap and instep and knit this one continue by knitting all the 36 held instep sts as charted in first row of instep chart beginning at stitch 2 and ending at stitch 37 of the chart then pick up 1 st between instep and heel flap and knit it pick up 17 more sts along side of heel flap and knit them knit the 40 other sole sts now you have 58 sole sts and 36 instep sts shift the first and the last stitch of the sole over onto the instep needle s now you have 56 sole sts and 38 instep sts instep chart gusset decrease round 1 work instep in pattern as established knit to last st of sole k2tog last sole st together with first instep st of next round round 2 work the rest of the instep sts in pattern to last st ssk last stitch together with first sole st knit across all the other sole sts to end of sole work these 2 rounds 11 times 22 rounds total decreasing 2 sts every other round now there are 38 instep sts and 34 sole sts ©caoua coffee 2012 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved bly v 1 1 page 4/5 bly socks - by caoua coffee foot continue instep in pattern as established while always knitting the 34 sole sts work until foot is approx 2 inches shorter than desired length end having worked all sole stitches in a round of one of the following instep lines 1 or 15 if foot is not quite long enough when you have worked that last round 1 or 15 then just repeat this round some more times until foot is long enough toe set-up shift the first and the last instep stitch over onto the sole needle s now you have 36 instep sts and 36 sole sts toe round 1 decrease round k1 ssk work sts as they appear to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of sole k2tog k1 round 2 plain round work all sts as they appear i e knit the knit sts purl the purl sts repeat this 2 rounds until you have 36 sts left then always work round 1 until there are 16 sts left finishing leaving a tail of
